productKnowledges.description: Your go-to outdoor leggings. Made in our mid-weight, durable Textured Compression, engineered to sculpt and fit like a glove.

productKnowledges.title: Ideal For
productKnowledges.description: Medium to high-sweat Recreation — think running, spinning, training, and court sports.

properties.description: Your go-to outdoor leggings. Engineered to sculpt and fit like a glove. Made in our mid-weight, durable Textured Compression fabric. Product was formerly called 7/8 Springs Leggings.
